Reviews.Title: “Badly needs refurbishing”

Reviews.Content: plus staff friendly helpful cheap minus hotel complete refurbishment walls repainting carpet shot travelodge wish rival premier inn raise game

Reviews.Title: “Dirty, smelly, the worst!!”

Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night thankfully dirty smelly leg broken bed pillows bathroom filthy shower complained told pillows moved carpets stained walls bashed dirty time leg bed hanging travelodge budget chain frills expect basic standards cleanliness beds slept travelodge 3 times found poor service 3 filthy conditions
